values.name: Bright Property Solutions
values.description:
Bright Property Solutions are specialist plasterers with many years experience in the industry. We provide a wide range of plastering services in Brighton, Crawley and the surrounding areas.
Bright Property Solutions professional and reliable team of plasterers pride themselves on high standards of workmanship and are very confident that we will be able to meet your requirements. All our work guaranteed and we are we are fully insured.

Hanover Digital specialises in website programming, production and consultancy.

Website production - From a single page to large scale, fully content managed websites. Expert knowledge and experience of developing bespoke content management systems using Wordpress.

Social Media - HD will keep you up to date with all of the emerging and continually evolving trends.

Email marketing - Expertise and deep experience in this still crucial area of business.

Based in Brighton (UK) with a broad range of clients across the south east of England.
values.name: Hanover Digital Limited

values.description:
Number 8 Group is a Construction and Recruitment company that focuses on the supply of trades & labour as well as white collar contractors to the construction & property, civil engineering and infrastructure industries. 

"We have a wealth of experience working within construction recruitment and indeed working in the sector itself. Together with our unique Number 8, core principles, we believe that service is everything".

Zinzan Brooke, CEO - Number 8 Group.

Our core divisions provide our clients with a one stop shop - Trades & Labour, demolition, freelance management/commercial staff, search & selection and package works. We have also recently opened in Brighton to cover the South Coast and also New Zealand to provide staff for the Christchurch earthquake rebuild.

Our newest division, Number 8 Demolition, has been set up to deliver a much needed specialist service to the sector UK wide. We're aiming to become the market leader by the end of 2013, providing temporary labour that's as good as your directly employed operatives. 

If you are looking for work, either contact us at the email address below or register your CV on: http://www.number8group.co.uk 

Trevor Mills - Managing Director
trevor.mills@number8group.co.uk
values.name: Number 8 Group
Holistic Treats
values.description:
Holistic Treats provides holistic, massage and beauty services in Brighton.

Treatments are; reflexology, reiki, Swedish massage, aromatherapy massage, hot stone massage, Indian head m assage, natural lift facial massage, Eve Taylor facials, Spa Ritual manicures and pedicures and waxing.

values.name: Jane Henderson, Visual Artist
values.description: I make contemporary sculpture and installation. I work extensively with gallery education projects, particularly at Towner,Eastbourne. I am also visiting lecturer in Fine Art at South Coast College, Hastings. I am currently involved in an artist residency at an Infant and Nursery school in Brighton. I am consultant artist on and Arts Council funded project with Lucid Incident theatre group, for whom I am designing a series of sets for 'The Box Project', which is at research and development stage. During 2010 I am developing a curatorial project 'Honey Fisher Presents' in collaboration with a number of other artists

values.name: The Sussex Beacon
values.description: The Sussex Beacon is a specialist care centre for men, women and families affected by HIV. We are based in Brighton, Sussex and have a ten bed Inpatient Unit as well as Health Management Services including, Anxiety Management, Sleep Service, Day Service and Women & Families Service.

Sussex Sport Photography is a leading UK race and event photography company taking pictures of competitors for competitors. 

Delivering a fast and efficient service for competitors and event organisers, race galleries are hosted online quickly after the competiton for easy browsing and ordering using event numbers to find their photos. 

Event organisers can choose to sponsor coverage and enable all competitors to benefit from free downloads of them taking part in the action. With added event branding and logos these can serve to improve and deliver even better value for competitors and lasting memories of the event and ongoing promotion long after the race has finished.

Sussex Sport Photography is a brandname of UK Sport Photo Ltd
Registered Office: 100 Church St., Brighton, East Sussex, England, BN1 1UJ
Registered in England Company No. 07940115
 
VAT No. GB 129 6322 11
values.name: Sussex Sport Photography

We pride ourselves on our professional standards, quality of workmanship and exceptional levels of customer service. Covering all of the major towns and cities across Sussex including  Brighton, Worthing and Haywards Heath.
iPlumb.it offers professional plumbing and heating solutions from design to completion.

We are a small and friendly school based in the centre of Brighton, England. We currently run English language courses including general English, Cambridge exam preparation and some English for specific purposes courses such as medical English. values.description:

values.description: Shenanigen Films is a post production company based in London and Brighton specialising in film trailers and promotions. What separates us from the rest is we can create high quality trailers to support any budget with our three tier trailer system. Each Trailer is broken into three different tiers based on the complex elements used in trailer based on price, music, and text.

ANDREW JONES ASSOCIATES
values.description: Private Architect Practice specialising in stylish residential and commercial office & restaurant refurbishment for developers and domestic clients ranging from Grade Listed properties to extensively fire damapaged properties. New one off new build designer houses are also on portfolio. The practice is based in the London Borough of Sutton and covers Central, West and South London and as far a field as Oxford, Cotswolds,Guildford, Chichester and Brighton.

Specialists in the treatment of RSI Repetitive Strain Injuries, WRULD and carpal tunnel syndrome.  We train established practitioners in clinical massage to treat the causes of repetitive strain injuries.

Clinics in London, Edinburgh, Brighton and Oxford.

values.description: Marco Betti gained a BA honours in Photography and Film from the University of Westminster in 1994. He lives and works as a freelance photographer in Brighton England, and has traveled the developing world on photographic assignments for corporate clients, development agencies and charities. His work has been published in The Sunday Times, The Daily Telegraph, The Guardian, The British Journal of Photography and House and Garden among other publications nationally and internationally.
values.name: Marco Betti Photography

We have the best apartments that Boston has to offer. If you are looking for an apartment in Boston or in the surrounding Boston area, we have the highest quality selection of apartment rentals available in all of Boston's historic neighborhoods. We feature apartments in Back Bay, Beacon Hill, the North End, the South End, Brighton, Allston, Brookline, Cambridge, South Boston, Somerville, and more!

We specialize in Boston apartment rentals, and we the best that Boston has to offer. We are centrally located on Newbury Street, in the heart of Back Bay, and we are open seven days a week for your convenience.

Here at Newman & Company, we understand that everybody has different objectives when searching for an apartment in Boston. We feature all kinds of apartments from a cozy studio to a classic brownstone, and our professional staff aims to achieve optimal results for each client. You can turn to us for your Boston real estate needs!
values.name: Newman and Company
Geeks 2 Go - Mobile Computer Services
values.description:
Geeks 2 Go offers quality onsite computer repairs and services throughout all areas of Melbourne. Our local suburbs include Bentleigh, Bentleigh East, Moorabbin, Oakleigh, Brighton, Ormond, Caulfield, Caulfield South, Caulfield East, St. Kilda and Malvern

The advantage is that we provide our services in your own Home or Office - instead of having to disconnect your system and delivering it to a computer repair store - We come to you!
You can ask questions and see exactly what we are doing, no need to unplug and move your computer system which could cause additional problems and finally the ability to thoroughly test your system and other devices before we leave your home.

values.name: The Green Man & Van
values.description:
The Green Man & Van is an environmentally aware and socially responsible removal and logistics company based in London and Brighton. Our aim is to offer friendly and reliable services that have minimal impact on the environment.

Our vehicles are modern, clean, and fully insured. They are fuelled with locally sourced biodiesel, made from recycled waste cooking oil. This means that the amount of additional CO2 and other harmful pollutants pumped into the atmosphere is greatly reduced. Our carbon neutral service is available for both residential customers and commercial or charitable/community organisations.

We have simple and very competitive rates, so doing your bit for the environment won't cost the earth. We are also proud to offer reduced tariff to any organisations that also help the environment and the wider community such as charities, Not-For-Profit organisations and eco-businesses.

Arthur Guy is a freelance website developer based in Brighton in the South East of England; he designs and builds accessible, content driven websites which are search engine friendly.

Arthur Guy primarily works on content management systems and other behind the scenes elements, but he also enjoy developing interfaces and other user interaction elements.
